name: Sky Escape - Car Chase
description:
The police car is chasing closely behind you! Get rid of it as soon as possible! As long as swipe up and down on the screen, the road can be drawn for your car. If you are mostly chased by the police car, try to wave to move like a roller coaster and get rid of it.
Don’t forget to collect the coins when you are moving!

Game Features
-Free game with endless fun.
-Different types of cars are waiting for you to collect.
-Variety of maps to challenge your extreme.
